org.xbmc.android.remote.business

Class AbstractManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbmc.android.remote.business.AbstractManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    INotifiableManager
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ControlManager, InfoManager, MusicManager, TvShowManager, VideoManager

    public abstract class AbstractManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements INotifiableManager
    Super class of the wrappers, keeps common code.
    Author:
    Team XBMC

      • cacheCover

        public static boolean cacheCover(ICoverArt cover,
                 INotifiableManager manager,
                 Context context)
        Synchronously downloads a cover and stores on on disk cache.
        Parameters:
        cover - Cover to cache
        manager - Reference to manager
        context - Reference to context
        Returns:
        True if cover has been downloaded, false otherwise.

      • getCoverFromMem

                   ICoverArt cover,
                   int thumbSize,
                   Bitmap defaultCover,
                   Context context,
                   boolean getFromCacheOnly)
        Tries to get small cover from memory, then from disk, then download it from XBMC.
        Parameters:
        response - Response object
        cover - Get cover for this object

        Parameters:

      • getSortBy

        protected int getSortBy(int type)
        Returns currently saved "sort by" value. If the preference was not set yet, or if the current sort key is not set, return default value.
        Parameters:
        type - Default value
        Returns:
        Sort by field

      • getSortOrder

        protected java.lang.String getSortOrder()
        Returns currently saved "sort by" value. If the preference was not set yet, or if the current sort key is not set, return "ASC".
        Returns:
        Sort order
